EmailTemplate.name: D&S Comms.LTS101 Webcast Confirmation 09012015
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Honeywell Aerospace LTS101 Technical Webcast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell Aerospace AWARS Webcast hosted by Customer & Product Support
You're invited to participate in the Honeywell Aerospace AWARS webcast. The webcast will provide an overview of the AWARS 2014 Licensing structure followed by a question and answer session.
Date: Wednesday, October 30, 2013
Time: 8:00 AM (Pacific) 15:00 PM UTC (GMT)
TO REGISTER:
1. At least 30 minutes prior to the start of the event, please click here <http://engage.vevent.com/rt/honeywell~103013_1625434>to register and join the session.
2. If you're unable to join the web streaming event but would like to follow the discussion by phone, please dial in using the following conferencing numbers:
Toll-free (866) 253-6509 Toll (703) 639-1208
We look forward to your attendance at the Honeywell Aerospace AWARS Webcast.
